name: Colerr
description:
Colerr is a simple color trick game made for mobile. I have released it on Google Play Store. It may not be available as of now (due to the review process). I just wanted to complete a small game. And here it is!

Rules:

If the color and the word are same, press the green button. Otherwise, press the red button.

As you play the game, you will get lesser time to select the right choice.

NOTE: If the game display is bigger than your browser, try playing it in browser fullscreen mode (F11 in Chrome).
